name: AutoSwitchConfig
description: 打开需要软件时修改marketname，杀软件后关闭
condition: if (frontPkgChanged == true && globalVarOf$miuiApps.contains(to)) {ui.showShortToast("enter miuiApps,set marketname");ui.showShortToast("" + su.exe("resetprop ro.product.marketname MIX4"));} else if (pkgKilled == true && globalVarOf$miuiApps.contains(pkgName)) { ui.showShortToast("exit miuiApps,remove marketname");ui.showShortToast("" + su.exe("resetprop --delete ro.product.marketname"));}
